headline: How to negotiate salary to earn more?
description:
Hi all, 
I am looking for new job opportunities as I am not feeling in my current job i could ask for pay rise. ( well after performance review it could be possible but i don't really want to wait that long (end of the year) 
so I am looking for advices how to negotiate salary during interview process? How to ask for maximum salary they are able to pay?
Thanks!
headline_zh-Hans: 如何谈判工资以获得更多收入？
headline_zh-Hant: 如何談判工資以獲得更多收入？
description_zh-Hans:
大家好。
我正在寻找新的工作机会，因为我不觉得我现在的工作可以要求加薪。(好吧，在业绩审查之后，这可能是可能的，但我真的不想等那么久（年底）。
所以我想请教一下，如何在面试过程中谈及薪水？如何要求他们能够支付的最高工资？
谢谢。
